Package rrpss

Class Order

java.lang.Object
rrpss.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Order extends Object implements Serializable
Class to represent an order made by a table in the restaurant.
Author:
Nipun Bhatia
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order​(int staffID, int custID, int TableNo, int pax, double TotalBill_original, double TotalBill_nett, Calendar orderDateTime, String orderID)
      Public Constructor to create a new order with the given information
      Parameters:
      staffID - Staff ID of the staff entertaining the table
      custID - Customer ID of the customer at the table
      TableNo - Table Number of the table
      pax - Number of people at the table
      TotalBill_original - Original total bill amount, exclusive of taxes and discounts (if any)
      TotalBill_nett - Finalised bill amount to be paid by the customer
      orderDateTime - Date and time of order placing
      orderID - Order ID of the order

    • Order

      public Order​(int staffID, int custID, int TableNo, int pax, double TotalBill_original, double TotalBill_nett, Calendar orderDateTime, String orderID, List<orderitem> orderItems)
      Public Constructor for existing order with the given information
      Parameters:
      staffID - Staff ID of the staff entertaining the table
      custID - Customer ID of the customer at the table
      TableNo - Table Number of the table
      pax - Number of people at the table
      TotalBill_original - Original total bill amount, exclusive of taxes and discounts (if any)
      TotalBill_nett - Finalised bill amount to be paid by the customer
      orderDateTime - Date and time of order placing
      orderID - Order ID of the order
      orderItems - Existing order
